response.original_title: Talks on Sri Ramana Maharshi: Narrated by David Godman - The Power of the Guru
response.overview: This two-part film discusses various aspects of how Sri Ramana Maharahi used his power, and how it was experienced by the people who were in his presence. This segment includes explanations by Sri Ramana on how the power of the Self works, along with detailed accounts of occasions when he tried to bring about progress or liberation in devotees by touching them.
response.title: Talks on Sri Ramana Maharshi: Narrated by David Godman - The Power of the Guru
